item.description:
The Philadelphia-based Dr. Dog are part of a long tradition of D.I.Y. pop oddballs who blend unapologetic '60s pop worship with lo-fi recording techniques and an apparent disregard for current trend...truly fun psychedelic pop and with a new album that is just as amazing as their previous release (Fate) this is guaranteed to be a great show!!! Take a listen to the sound:

http://lala.com/z9zaY...

I would pre buy my ticket as this show is HIGHLY likely to sell out!!! (Tickets are $20) I will send out pre meetup plans closer to the day of the show. I hope to see you there!!!
item.name: Dr. Dog at the Dise (Tuesday show)
